scripts.setup-libs: cd libs && rm -rf schematic-renderer && rm -rf ../node_modules/schematic-renderer && rm -rf ../frontend/node_modules/schematic-renderer && ls *.tgz | head -1 | xargs -I {} tar -xzf {} && mv package schematic-renderer && mkdir -p ../node_modules && cp -r schematic-renderer ../node_modules/ && mkdir -p ../frontend/node_modules && cp -r schematic-renderer ../frontend/node_modules/
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && bun run build && cp -r dist ../dist-frontend
scripts.build: bun run build:frontend && bun run build:backend
scripts.build:clean: bun run clean && cd frontend && bun i && cd .. && bun i && bun run build
scripts.dev: concurrently -n vite,backend -c cyan,green "bun run dev:frontend" "sleep 3 && bun run dev:backend"
